CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Onboarding_Type__c, 'Standard'), AND(PAM_Manager_Approval__c, MNDA_Signed__c, Legal_Agreement_Executed__c, Sales_Ops_Validation__c), IF( ISPICKVAL(Onboarding_Type__c, 'Non-Standard'), AND(MNDA_Signed__c, Legal_Agreement_Executed__c, Sales_Ops_Validation__c), IF( ISPICKVAL(Onboarding_Type__c, 'Expansion'), AND(Legal_Agreement_Executed__c, Sales_Ops_Validation__c, PAM_Manager_Approval__c), FALSE ) ) )
CustomField.label: Partner Onboarding Complete
